turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to file an insurance claim. I had a car accident last week and my car is pretty messed up.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am very sorry to hear about your accident. I can certainly help you with the claims process. To begin, could you please provide your policy number and the date of the accident?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my policy number is ABC-123-XYZ, and the accident was on July 12th. But listen, the other driver is claiming it was my fault, which is totally untrue. How does that affect things?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. We will investigate the details of the accident. We'll need a police report, if one was filed, and any witness statements. The claims process can be complex, and the outcome will depend on the evidence. We will be in touch within 5 business days. At this stage, is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, actually. My car is at the repair shop, but they say they can't start repairs until the claim is approved. How long will it take to get that approval? And also, what if the other driver's insurance company says their client wasn't at fault?
